resources.string:
Hi, my name is Adrishyantee Maiti. 

I love Chicken. 

Chicken Leg Piece :) 
I am a foodie and I like to attend parties for their free food. 

I also like eating fish ,meat and eggs. I am a pure Non-Vegan. 
And sometimes I even go marketting to see if something matches my taste. 
But I would prefer Chicken to fish. 

I have some experience with cooking. 

I'll be happy to teach you how to make your own Chicken Meal. 
You should try Lemon Chicken if you haven't yet.
